name: 郭政淳
objective: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
schedule:
Wk1    Orientation / Understanding Style
Wk2    Expository Essays
Wk3    Problem Solution Essays
Wk4    Correctness / Peer Review Demo
Wk5    Actions (I)
Wk6    Actions (II) / Peer Review (I)
Wk7    Characters (I)
Wk8    Characters (II) / Peer Review (II)
Wk9    Emphasis
Wk10   Concision
Wk11   Peer Review (III) / Cohesion & Coherence
Wk12   Shape 
Wk13   Peer Review (IV) / Motivation (I)
Wk14   Motivation (II)
Wk15   Writing Reviews (I)
Wk16   Writing Reviews (II) / Peer Review (V)
Wk17   The Ethics of Style
Wk18   Fina Exam
scorePolicy:
Writing Assignments  35%
  (including essay/research proposal/review/term paper)  
Peer Review               15%
Style Exercises          30%
Final Exam                20%
materials:
Angell, Roger. 2000. The Elements of Style. 4th Edition. New York: Longman. 
Bizup, Joseph and Joseph M. Williams. 2014. Style: Lessons in Clarity and Grace. Eleventh Edition.
